e="preserve">Denis Van Akiyama (May 28, 1952 – June 28, 2018) was a Canadian actor. He was born in Toronto. He was best known for being the voice of Bobby Drake, Silver Samurai, and Sunfire in the "X-Men Animated Series" and Malachite/Kunzite in the original English version of "Sailor Moon". He played Shinji in "Johnny Mnemonic".
In 2015, he appeared in the movie "Pixels" as Professor Iwatani.
Akiyama died in Toronto on June 28, 2018 at the age of 66.
